happened, .... Colorful, old school (I love that she prefers using film!) ..... little over 
a year after meeting at a wedding where Luke was a wedding crasher!
search_results.title: Santa Barbara Engagement Shoot Giveaway - Once Wed

question: He went "Old School" as a "Wedding Crasher"
